__TOC__

This page is to keep track of statistics and information regarding Ubuntu Norge's activities:

* 6. February 2007 - Installfest participation - Set up 5 machines (including a PowerPC Mac with JAVA??!!) and distributed CDs and stickers (Lovely sent from Canonical and System76 respectively, thanks!)
* 04. September 2007 - Installfest participation - Installed Ubuntu in around 70 machines and distributed stickers and CDs to everyone who got Ubuntu installed (over 50 stickers and 13 CDs distributed). See pics <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ec/ruben/images/ubuntu/hubuntu/DSC_2196.JPG|here]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ec/ruben/images/ubuntu/hubuntu/DSC_2203.JPG|here]]</nowiki> and the poster <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ec/ruben/images/ubuntu/hubuntu/olug-plakat-2007-09-04-installasjonsfest-1.pdf|here]]</nowiki>. here the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ec/ruben/images/ubuntu/hubuntu/olug-plakat-2007-09-04-installasjonsfest.odt|odt file too]]</nowiki>.
* Organizer of the Software Freedom Day in Oslo. <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ec/ruben/images/ubuntu/sfd/08|Pictures available]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://huayra.wordpress.com/2008/09/20/week-update-sfd08-and-more/|blog entry]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[UbuntuWeeklyNewsletter-Issue109#Software%20Freedom%20Day:%20Ubuntu-NO|mention in the Ubuntu Weekly News issue #109]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[NorwegianTeam-Arrangementer-IntrepidReleaseParty|Intrepid Release Party in Oslo]]</nowiki> - Organizing, getting sponsors and working with some other details
* <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu.no/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=2007|Jaunty Release Party in Oslo]]</nowiki> - Organizing, getting sponsors and working with some other details. See our <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ec/ruben/images/ubuntu/ubucon904kit.tar.gz|marketing kit]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[NorwegianTeam-Arrangementer-KarmicReleaseParty|Karmic Release Party in Oslo]]</nowiki> - Organizing, getting sponsors and working with some other details.
* <nowiki>[[NorwegianTeam-Arrangementer-LucidReleaseParty|Lucid Release Party]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[NorwegianTeam-Arrangementer-MaverickReleaseParty|Maverick Release Party]]</nowiki> - Summary from the event is available <nowiki>[[http://huayra.wordpress.com/2010/10/10/ubuntu-norway-release-parties-10-10-10/|here]]</nowiki>.
* Natty Release Party (not held?)
